Combat Notes:

Arcane Strike: May imbue weapons with +5 magic damage bonus for 1 rd
Bomb: May create bombs that inflict 5d6+1 HP fire on hit and 6 HP fire splash (DC 16 Ref half) 11/dy
Concussive Bomb: May create bombs that inflict 5d4 HP sonic instead of fire; a direct hit deafens for 1 min (DC 16 Fort neg)
Delayed Bomb: May configure bombs to explode after up to 10 rd (Dispel Magic or DC 21 Disable Device neg)
Swift Alchemy: May apply poison to a weapon as a move action
Swift Poisoning: May apply poison to a weapon as a swift action
Throw Anything (Alchemist): Splash weapons inflict +1 HP damage
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash

Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2, B3
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus (Acid) effects
Intelligence Alchemist Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Alchemist1
Simple Somatics: Suffers no arcane spell failure in light armor
Alchemy: May infuse extracts that duplicate spell effects on self for 1 dy
Arcane Bond (Bard): May cast known spell through object
Arcane Spell Failure: 20%
Brew Potion: May create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Combine Extracts: May spend +2 formula slot to combine two formulas into one extract
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Distraction: R30' Bardic Performance gives Perform check vs. visual magic
Dweomercraft: May use Bardic Performance to give allies +2 caster level checks, concentration, and spell attack
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Enhance Potion: May cause imbibed potion to function at caster level 10 1/dy
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Expanded Repertoire: Knows 3 additional spells taken from any arcane class
Extended Performance: May expend a spell slot to extend Bardic Performance effects 1 rd/spell level
Fascinate: R90' Bardic Performance holds 4 creatures spellbound (DC 18 Will neg)
Feral Mutagen: Mutagen gives 2 claw attacks for 1d6 HP each, 1 bite attack for 1d8 HP damage, and +2 Intimidate
Improved Counterspell: May counterspell using a higher-level spell from the same school
Inspire Competence: R30' Bardic Performance gives allies +3 skill checks
Inspire Greatness: R30' Bardic Performance gives 1 allies 2d10 temporary HP, +2 attack, and +1 Fortitude
Mutagen: 1 hr process creates potions that give self +2 AC and +4/-2 to Strength/Intelligence, Dexterity/Wisdom, or Constitution/Charisma for 100 min
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Spell Suppression: May use Bardic Performance to counter Spellcraft-identified spell of level equal to or less than performance rds
Suggestion: May use Suggestion effects on 1 fascinated creature (DC 18 Will neg)
Swift Alchemy: May create alchemical items in half normal time
Wand Mastery: Uses Charisma bonus to calculate save DC of spells cast from wands
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
